#Text= Iroh says : " This is something that you must do on your own .

column1: #Text=The people who have been coming to the Spirit World lately have brought darkness and anger .
#Text=So that is what you see now .
#Text=But you have light and peace inside of you .
#Text=If you let it out , you can change the world around you .
#Text=When you first met him , you were frightened .
#Text=But does he seem scary to you now ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Many things that seem threatening in the dark become welcoming when we shine light on them .
#Text=Come visit me again - in this life , or the next .
#Text=Okay , time for you to go home .
